bug_report.Title: [Become a partner] button on 'Our partners' page in [أكثر] ([More]) menu isn't translated when selected langauge is AR
bug_report.Steps: https://github.com/dz-artsiukh/XML/blob/main/bug_report.xml Navigate to capital.com Select AR language Hover over [أكثر] ([More]) menu Click on menu item [شركاؤنا] ([Our partners]) The bug is also reproduced for the mobile
bug_report.Expected_result: [Become a partner] button is translated to AR
bug_report.Actual_result: [Become a partner] button isn't translated to AR
